system.availability: Attaches to the Shoulder or Backpack unit, provides all ranged weapons the user wields the benefits of a Red-Dot Laser Sight and Telescopic Sight as well as imposing -10 to Dodging Ranged Attacks made by the user.
system.cost:
Red-Dot Laser Sight: +10 to Single Shot Ranged Attacks
Telescopic Sight: Full Action Aiming ignores penalties for firing at Long or Extreme Ranges.
